author: IGN
description:
Even before the cameras started rolling, it was clear that The Fantastic Four: First Steps will be a very different take on Marvel's First Family. First came word that Julia Garner has been cast as the Silver Surfer. Then Marvel confirmed that the movie is set in an alternate universe that exists as a retro-futuristic, 1960s version of the MCU. And thanks to the newest First Steps trailer, we’ve gotten confirmation of another big twist. Vanessa Kirby’s Invisible Woman is pregnant.
If you’re not a hardcore FF reader, some of these reveals may raise more questions than they answer. Why is Silver Surfer a woman in the MCU? Why is it such a big deal that Susan Storm is having a baby? Here’s what you need to know about both twists and why First Steps is shaping up to be far different from any Fantastic Four movie we’ve gotten before.
The Fantastic Four: First Steps stars  Pedro Pascal, Vanessa Kirby, Joseph Quinn, and Ebon Moss-Bachrach, Ralph Ineson, Julia Garner, Paul Walter Hauser, John
title: The Fantastic Four: First Steps Trailer - The Two Game-Changing Twists

author: IGN
description:
Get a look at Star Wars: Beyond Victory - A Mixed Reality Playset in this trailer for the upcoming virtual and mixed reality experience, currently in development for Meta Quest headsets. Star Wars: Beyond Victory - A Mixed Reality Playset takes place around the time of Solo: A Star Wars Story and offers three distinct modes, including Adventure, Arcade, and Playset. 

In Adventure mode, using a combination of virtual and mixed reality, the story follows Volo – an aspiring podracer whose life gets flipped upside down under the mentorship of the infamous Sebulba. Experience the thrill of podracing in mixed reality on a virtual holotable in Arcade mode. With the Playset mode, transform the physical world around you and create your very own incredible Star Wars moments in mixed reality with a collection of unlockable virtual action figures and vehicles.
title: Star Wars Beyond Victory: A Mixed Reality Playset - Official Trailer | Star Wars Celebration 2025

author: IGN
title: Nintendo knows what we've done... #nintendo #mariokartworld #switch2 #penguin #memes #supermario64

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Nintendo held another Direct this morning, this one solely focused on Mario Kart World. All the new game modes were explained, along with a breakdown on new items. In related Nintendo news, there's some confusion over a disclaimer Nintendo has for the Switch 2 version of Tears of the Kingdom. Currently, it sounds like the game won't support the cloud saves you may have via Nintendo Switch Online. A similar disclaimer was placed on the Switch 2 versions of Breath of the Wild and Mario Party Jamboree, but have since been removed. You will still be able to get your old saves over via manually transferring your data, but it would be a lot more convenient to do it over the cloud. And finally, a new form of currency has been added to Marvel Rivals. Unstable Molecules will be used to change the color of your costume, at about a rate of 100 unstable molecules to every U.S. dollar.
title: New Mario Kart World Items, Modes and Features Revealed - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description: Get a look at Paddle Paddle Paddle in this chaotic trailer for the upcoming game about paddling (alone or together with a friend). Paddle Paddle Paddle will be available on PC in May 2025.
title: Paddle Paddle Paddle - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Learn more about the story of Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 in this latest trailer for the upcoming turn-based RPG with real-time mechanics. The new trailer dives into the motivation of your characters, the threat they're up against, and gives a peek at combat. Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 will be available on PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X/S, Epic Games Store, and Steam on April 24, 2025. Lead the members of Expedition 33 on their quest to destroy the Paintress so that she can never paint death again. Explore a world of wonders inspired by Belle Époque France and battle unique enemies.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 - Official Trailer | Galaxies Gaming Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
This Easter, will you be blessed, cursed, or worse?
Phasmophobia puts teams of up to four players in the role of paranormal investigators. Armed with specialist ghost hunting equipment, players collect supernatural evidence in a variety of haunted locations. Following its entry into early access in September 2020, Phasmophobia quickly became a global phenomenon, captivating millions of players with its immersive gameplay, chilling atmosphere and cooperative ghost hunting mechanics.
Phasmophobia: Cursed Hollow is available now on Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5, PlayStation VR2, and PC.
title: Phasmophobia: Cursed Hollow - Official Launch Trailer | Galaxies Gaming Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description: Watch the latest Ready or Not trailer to see gameplay and learn about your objectives. Ready or Not is an intense, tactical, first-person shooter that depicts a modern-day world in which SWAT police units are called to defuse hostile and confrontational situations. Ready or Not is available on PC, and it is coming to PS5 (PlayStation 5) and Xbox Series X/S in summer 2025.
title: Ready or Not - Official Console Announce Trailer | Galaxies Gaming Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out gameplay and get another look at FBC: Firebreak in this latest trailer for the upcoming cooperative first-person shooter set within a mysterious federal agency under assault by otherworldly forces. As a years-long siege on the agency’s headquarters reaches its boiling point, only Firebreak— the Bureau’s most versatile unit—has the gear and the guts to plunge into the building’s strangest crises, restore order, contain the chaos, and fight to reclaim control. FBC: Firebreak will be available in summer 2025 on PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X/S, Game Pass, Steam, and Epic Games Store.

#IGN #Gaming
title: FBC: Firebreak - Official Trailer | Galaxies Gaming Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description: Join developer Nekki for a deep dive into the gameplay of Spine in this new trailer for the upcoming single-player action game about close-quarters gunfights with aesthetics of Gun Fu movies. Step into the stunning cyberpunk world with rebellious street artist Redline and her sentient combat implant Spine as they defy the autocratic AI regime in search of Redline's captured brother. Spine will be available on PC.
title: Spine - Official Overview Trailer | Galaxies Gaming Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description: Take a look at action-packed gameplay from Trench Tales in this trailer for the upcoming story-driven third-person action game set in a dark, alternative world between WWI and WWII. Harness unique powers, customize your arsenal, and navigate haunting Gothic landscapes. Battle fallen soldiers as you uncover the mysteries of this realm. Trench Tales will be available on PC.
title: Trench Tales - Official Gameplay Trailer | Galaxies Gaming Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description: The latest Painkiller trailer shows some of the brutal weapons you'll wield in this upcoming modern reimagining of the classic franchise, featuring online co-op for up to three players and offline play. Battle hordes of demons and titanic terrors across richly detailed gothic environments. Trapped in Purgatory, you are sentenced for your transgressions against Heaven. But the Voice of the Creator gives you a chance to redeem yourself. As one of the Champions, you are to stop the fallen angel Azazel who is about to unleash his demonic armies onto Earth. You will face hordes of enemies, demons with unique powers and three monstrous children of Azazel - the Nephilim. Will you succeed in your mission and earn your salvation? Painkiller will be available on PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X/S, and Steam in fall 2025.
title: Painkiller - Official Trailer | Galaxies Gaming Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Learn about the story of Hear Tell of Hauntings in this trailer for the upcoming survival horror game. Hear Tell of Hauntings will be available on PC. The year is 1897. Deep in the mountains of Montana, former outlaw Adelaide Clancy sets off to find her missing friend and uncover the mystery that shrouds the Wraith estate. Solve puzzles, fight monsters, and introduce yourself to the inhabitants of the manor in this third-person survival horror game.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Hear Tell of Hauntings - Official Trailer | Galaxies Gaming Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description: Unbeatable is a rhythm adventure where music is illegal and you do crimes. Follow the story of Beat and her band on the run, in a narrative experience full of big emotions powered by arcade-flawless rhythm gameplay. Get a deep dive into the gameplay and story of Unbeatable in the latest trailer for the upcoming game. Unbeatable will be available on PC, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and Xbox Series X/S. A demo is out now on Steam and PS5.
title: Unbeatable - Official Overview Trailer | Galaxies Gaming Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
See chaotic gameplay from Deliver At All Costs in this trailer for the upcoming action game where destruction, absurdity and intrigue collide! Step into the shoes of Winston Green — a down-on-his-luck courier with a fiery temper and a mysterious past — as he delivers highly unconventional cargo, leaving a trail of havoc and chaos behind him. Deliver At All Costs will be available on PC (via Steam, GOG, and Epic Games Store), PS5 (PlayStation 5), and Xbox Series X/S on May 22, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Deliver at All Costs - Official Gameplay Trailer | Galaxies Gaming Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description: Command distinct factions in a desperate struggle for power and resources in Tempest Rising - a classic RTS set on Earth after a nuclear war. Tempest Rising will be available on April 24, 2025 on PC via Steam, and it is out now for Deluxe Edition owners. Check out the launch trailer.
title: Tempest Rising - Official Launch Trailer | Galaxies Gaming Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Covenant is a first-person dark fantasy combat game in which you play as a messenger sent from above. Wield martial arts, secret magic, and ancient weapons to explore a vast interconnected world. Watch the Covenant trailer to dive into the twisted world and see the foes you'll encounter. Covenant will be available on PC.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Covenant - Official Trailer | Galaxies Gaming Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Nintendo showed off 15 minutes of Mario Kart World, sharing more details about Free Roam, Battle Mode, and more new features coming to the Nintendo Switch 2 launch game. But we still have some questions about how open world exploration will work and what rewards and unlockables are in store. This week, join Logan Plant, Jada Griffin, Nick Limon, and Brian Altano as they break down all the big news from the presentation.

#IGN #Gaming #Nintendo
title: The Mario Kart World Direct Answered Some Questions and Raised Some New Ones - NVC Clips

author: IGN
description:
Check out The Sandman teaser trailer for a peek at what's coming in Season 2 of the fantasy series starring Tom Sturridge, Kirby Howell-Baptiste, Mason Alexander Park, Donna Preston, Esmé Creed-Miles, Adrian Lester, Barry Sloane, Patton Oswalt, Vivienne Acheampong, Gwendoline Christie, Jenna Coleman, Ferdinand Kingsley, Stephen Fry, Asim Chaudhry, Sanjeev Bhaskar, Razane Jammal, Ruairi O’Connor, Freddie Fox, Clive Russell, Laurence O’Fuarain, Ann Skelly, Douglas Booth, Jack Gleeson, Indya Moore, and Steve Coogan.

After a fateful reunion with his family, Dream of the Endless (Tom Sturridge) must face one impossible decision after another as he attempts to save himself, his kingdom, and the waking world from the epic fallout of his past misdeeds. To make amends, Dream must confront longtime friends and foes, gods, monsters, and mortals. But the path to forgiveness is full of unexpected twists and turns, and true absolution may cost Dream everything. Based on the beloved award-winning D
title: The Sandman: Season 2 - Official Date Announcement Teaser Trailer (2025) Tom Sturridge

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Abathor: Ultimate Edition trailer for this definitive edition of the 2D action platformer game that can be played solo or for up to 4 players. Abathor: Ultimate Edition features a handcrafted world map, balanced difficulty modes, and more. Abathor: Ultimate Edition

#IGN #Gaming
title: Abathor: Ultimate Edition - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Sinners, reviewed by Eric Goldman.

Ryan Coogler enters the horror realm and nails it in Sinners, which drops vampires into a deeply personal, heartfelt, emotional, sexy, and bloody story that’ll stick with you. Michael B. Jordan wows in a dual performance as twins Smoke and Stack, and other frequent Coogler collaborators like cinematographer Autumn Durald Arkapaw and costume designer Ruth E. Carter do remarkable work bringing the brothers’ world to life. Sinners also puts music to beautiful use, as we’re reminded that vampirism is but one way to achieve immortality.

#IGN #Movies
title: Sinners Review

author: IGN
description:
Oscar-winning director Danny Boyle and Academy Award-nominated writer Alex Garland are back for 28 Years Later. In this exclusive featurette, the duo discuss developing a world where the rage virus has ravaged humans for decades. 

It’s been almost three decades since the rage virus escaped a biological weapons laboratory, and now, still in a ruthlessly enforced quarantine, some have found ways to exist amidst the infected. 

One such group of survivors lives on a small island connected to the mainland by a single, heavily-defended causeway. 

When one of the group leaves the island on a mission into the dark heart of the mainland, he discovers secrets, wonders, and horrors that have mutated not only the infected but other survivors as well.

28 Years Later opens exclusively in theaters on June 20, 2025.

#28YearsLater #Movies #IGN
title: 28 Years Later - Exclusive Behind the Scenes Clip (2025) Danny Boyle, Alex Garland

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Season 16: Stadium Trailer for Overwatch 2, a free-to-play team-based hero first-person shooter developed by Blizzard. Players can become acquainted with the new permanent game mode Stadium, a best-of-7 round-based mode where players will earn Stadium Cash to unlock powerful, game-changing abilities. Players can have the option of switching from first or third-person perspectives alongside unlocking rewards as progression is made through the ranks. Season 16: Stadium for Overwatch 2 is launching on April 22 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#IGN #Gaming #Overwatch2
title: Overwatch 2 Season 16: Stadium - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Version 2.0 Update Overview Trailer for Lords of the Fallen, an action RPG developed by CI Games. Players can get the rundown on the new updates coming to Version 2.0 with Shared-Progression Crossplay Co-op and a Free Friend's Pass that allows players to invite any friend to join your adventure in online co-op, even if they don’t own the game. Lords of the Fallen Version 2.0 also has revamps to combat and movement, a dedicated jump button, a full weapon audio overhaul, and more. Version 2.0 of Lords of the Fallen is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Xbox Game Pass, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store)

#IGN #Gaming
title: Lords of the Fallen: Version 2.0  - Official Update Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Launch Trailer for Mandragora: Whispers of the Witch Tree, an action Metroidvania RPG developed by Primal Game Studio. Players will fight across a dark fantasy world with six unique classes, the ability to craft items, and dispatch a variety of enemies across an expansive world. Mandragora: Whispers of the Witch Tree is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Mandragora: Whispers of the Witch Tree - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the latest 'Classic Jurassic' Jurassic World Rebirth featurette, the latest addition to the iconic action dinosaur-centric film series distributed by Universal Pictures. Join the cast and crew such as the screenwriter David Koepp, Scarlett Johansson, director Gareth Edwards, and more on the production of Jurassic World Rebirth as it sets out to call back to the original Jurassic Park in a multitude of ways. Jurassic World Rebirth is in theaters on July 2.

Set five years after the events of Jurassic World Dominion, the planet’s ecology has proven largely inhospitable to dinosaurs. Those remaining exist in isolated equatorial environments with climates resembling the one in which they once thrived. The three most colossal creatures within that tropical biosphere hold the key to a drug that will bring miraculous life-saving benefits to humankind.

Jurassic World Rebirth is directed by Gareth Edwards from a script by original Jurassic Park screenwriter David Koepp, based on ch
title: Jurassic World Rebirth - Official 'Classic Jurassic' Behind the Scenes (2025) Scarlett Johansson

author: IGN
description:
Check out this Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves anime music trailer featuring musical artist Salvatore Ganacci (who also appears as a playable character in the upcoming fighting game) in collaboration with legendary animator Masami Obari. Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves will be available on PS5 (PlayStation 5), PS4 (PlayStation 4), Xbox Series X/S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store) on April 24, 2025.

#FatalFury #Gaming #IGN
title: Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves - Official Special Anime Trailer

author: IGN
description: Get ready for the first ever Galaxies Digital Showcase on April 17th at Noon PT. Some of your favorite publishers such as Konami, Team 17, and many more will be rolling out the red carpet to showcase new games and update you on some of your favorite titles.
title: Galaxies Gaming Showcase

author: IGN
description:
In this snippet from podcast Beyond 892, there are rumors circulating yet again about a next-gen PlayStation Portable, or a portable PlayStation of some sort, which is in line with what everyone else is doing - but we do want Sony to do what everyone else is doing? The Steamdeck is an awesome machine, but it’s generous to call it handheld or portable device. The Nintendo Switch 2 is getting bigger, and more powerful, and for a lot of people, that’s great, but some of us are nostalgic for the days of gaming being a bit more… pocket sized. RIP PlayStation Vita.

Check out the full episode of Podcast Beyond here - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zRSWB95dVh8


This week’s show is Max Scoville, Jada Griffin, Brian Atlano, Mike Drucker, and is produced by Nick Maillet

#IGN #Gaming
title: When Did Gaming Handhelds Stop Being Fun-Size? - Beyond Clips

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the latest The Fantastic Four: First Steps trailer for the upcoming film and debut of The Fantastic Four in the Marvel Cinematic Universe, distributed by Marvel Studios. The Fantastic Four will face their biggest threat yet after their world is marked for annihilation. Set in an alternate universe with a 1960s futuristic aesthetic, The Fantastic Four are this Earth's only protectors against the forces of Galactus. Watch The Fantastic Four: First Steps in theaters on July 25.

The Fantastic Four: First Steps stars Pedro Pascal (Reed Richards/Mr. Fantastic), Joseph Quinn (Johnny Storm/The Human Torch), Vanessa Kirby (Sue Storm/The Invisible Woman), and Ebon Moss-Bachrach (Ben Grimm/Thing). The film is directed by Matt Shakman with the writers including Jeff Kaplan, Peter Cameron, and Josh Friedman.

The Fantastic Four: First Steps releases into theaters on July 25.

#FantasticFour #Marvel #Movies
title: The Fantastic Four: First Steps - Official Trailer (2025) Pedro Pascal, Joseph Quinn, Vanessa Kirby

author: IGN
description:
Tempest Rising single-player campaign reviewed by Dan Stapleton on PC.

Note: This review specifically covers the single-player campaigns of Tempest Rising. For thoughts on multiplayer, check IGN.com after launch.

Tempest Rising’s two good-sized single-player campaigns are a large helping of comfort food for RTS fans old enough to remember Command & Conquer in its heyday, and a way for everyone else to sample a classic style we don’t see very often anymore without having to deal with any creaky old technology. Its nature as an homage to those games does mean that it’s not terribly ambitious when it comes to doing anything bold you won’t have seen before, but it does put its own interesting spin on faction design that kept me experimenting with abilities throughout the campaigns and prevented it from feeling like too much of a retread. The main place it disappointed an old C&C fan like myself was in its straight-faced mission briefings that can’t compare to the B-movie goofiness and m
title: Tempest Rising Review - Single-Player Campaign

author: IGN
description:
Check out 10 new minutes of gameplay from RoadCraft, the upcoming construction site vehicle sim that will have you piloting Earthmovers, road pavers, and all sorts of other giant machinery. It's due out for PC on May 20. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2104890/RoadCraft/

#IGN #Gaming
title: RoadCraft: 10 Minutes of Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
Here’s a look at Mario Kart World in this brand new overview covering courses, characters, modes, and much more for the upcoming Nintendo Switch 2 launch game.

Get a good look at Mario Bros Circuit, Crown City, Salty Salty Speedway, Starview Peak, Boo Cinema, Toad's Factory, Peach Beach, Wario Shipyard, and more. Mario Kart World races can happen during the day and night. This detailed overview also gives us a peek at the Mario Kart racers, including Mario, Luigi, Peach, Bowser, Yoshi Goomba, Spike, and Cow. 

Check out this look at Mario Kart World Grand Prix, featuring the Mushroom Cup, Flower Cup, Star Cup, and more. Supporting up to 24 racers (up to four on the same console), compete to earn the most points across four connected courses where even the areas between courses are part of the race, too. Barrel through back-to-back courses with no pit stops along the way and hit checkpoints to stay in the race in Mario Kart World Knockout Tour mode. This detailed overview additionally
title: Mario Kart World - Game Overview | Nintendo Direct

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Full Release Date Trailer for Hordes of Hunger, a 3D action roguelike game developed by Hyperstrange. Players will assume the role of Mirah, a fearless warrior tasked with going up against waves of enemies to defend her homeland from a living hunger. Make use of powerful weapons, abilities, and in-depth hack-and-slash combat to progress through the game's evolving narrative. Hordes of Hunger is launching on May 6 for PC (Steam) via Steam Early Access.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Hordes of Hunger - Official Early Access Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the new Andor teaser trailer for Andor Season 2. This Star Wars series stars Diego Luna, Stellan Skarsgård, Genevieve O’Reilly, Denise Gough, Kyle Soller, Adria Arjona, Alan Tudyk, Faye Marsay, Varada Sethu, Elizabeth Dulau, with Ben Mendelsohn and Forest Whitaker. 

"We fight to win." The three-episode premiere of the final season of Andor will be available to stream on Disney+ on April 22, 2025.

#StarWars #Andor #TV
title: Andor: Season 2 - Official 'Win' Teaser Trailer (2025) Diego Luna, Ben Mendelsohn, Stellan Skarsgård

author: IGN
description:
Watch the tense new 28 Years Later trailer for the horror movie starring Jodie Comer, Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Alfie Williams, Jack O’Connell, and Ralph Fiennes.

28 Years Later is a brand new story set in the same world as 28 Days Later. Set three decades after the rage virus escaped a biological weapons laboratory, some have found ways to exist alongside the infected while still in a ruthlessly enforced quarantine. A group of survivors lives on a small island connected to the mainland by a single causeway. But when one of them leaves, he discovers wonders and horrors that have mutated both survivors and infected.

28 Years Later debuts exclusively in movie theaters on June 20, 2025. The film is directed by Danny Boyle and written by Alex Garland. Its executive producer is Cillian Murphy. It's produced by Andrew Macdonald, Peter Rice, Bernard Bellew, Danny Boyle, Alex Garland.

#28YearsLater #Movies #Trailer
title: 28 Years Later - Official Trailer 2 (2025) Jodie Comer, Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Ralph Fiennes

author: IGN
description:
Get a deep dive into what you can expect from the Nikoderiko: The Magical World - Director's Cut in this new trailer for the enriched and expanded edition of the platformer game. Nikoderiko: The Magical World - Director's Cut features a new world and boss, new modes, and reworked mechanics. Once again, players will join Niko and Luna, the adventurous mongoose duo, as they navigate breathtaking environments, befriend whimsical allies, and take on daring challenges in a cooperative quest brimming with heart and charm. Nikoderiko: The Magical World - Director's Cut is available now on Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, PS5 (PlayStation 5), PS4 (PlayStation 4), Nintendo Switch, and PC.
